nodes.text: Gelrood was a male Human pazaak gambler who lived on Taris. After winning fifteen games straight in the Upper City Cantina, he was accused of cheating. They confiscated his "lucky" deck and banned him from the cantina, forcing him to play in the Javyar's Cantina He claimed innocence and exceptional skill, denying the allegations of cheating.

In Knights of the Old Republic, if the player has Revan beat a card shark named Niklos in pazaak five times in a row, Niklos will accuse him of cheating. It is likely that Gelrood beat Niklos multiple times in the Upper City Cantina resulting in him getting banned and labeled falsely as a cheater.
Another NPC in the game named Holdan has the exact same character model and outfit as Gelrood, despite them both appearing in Javyars's Cantina simultaneously.
